} } } Length:: 0:18 MinsUsed this camera during our vacation in one of the islands in the Philippines. I could not believe it really worked under extreme conditions. The video was impeccable and it shoots wonderfully even in low light conditions. The GPS even showed me where I was under the water! It was really impressive that my relative upon seeing the camera's feature asked me to buy it next time I return.

Reviews.Title: Worked great in the Caribbean
Reviews.Author: Kitchens and Chemistry
Reviews.Content: We took this on two snorkeling trips in the Caribbean.  It worked okay.  No issues with the waterproofing, but the screen is hard to see underwater, and there's no "manual" viewfinder, so you are kind of guessing what your pictures will be!

Reviews.Title: Indestructible
Reviews.Author: Paige Winkle
Reviews.Content: Very cool camera, not afraid to take this thing anywhere! Well, almost, it doesn't float.. I recommend not getting black (I did-oops) or getting a float strap for it so that you don't lose it in the waterCan even take decent shots showing depth of field if you use the macro setting

Reviews.Title: Great Functioning Outdoor Proof Camera
Reviews.Author: Jon Sanders
Reviews.Content: Always liked Nikon and this does not disappoint. Functions well, takes great shots. A little scary the first time you do truly drop it into water but of course it can handle it. Just boggles the mind a bit. Could have a better flash and also the back screen is huge but isnt has high quality as the pictures it takes

Reviews.Title: Takes great pictures
Reviews.Author: Randal W.
Reviews.Content: Awesome little point and shoot camera for the outdoors minded person. Takes great pictures, it's easy to use, it's durable, light and easily slips into the pocket.I'd recomend it.

Reviews.Title: Great little Camera
Reviews.Author: D. Hancock "Interesting"
Reviews.Content: My wife and I bought this before our honeymoon. Our other submersible camera had died during a vacation and there was no way we were going snorkeling without a camera like this. We read a lot of reviews and decided that Nikon was probably the best bet.I'm of the opinion that a still camera should be a still camera and a video camera should be a video camera, so I wasn't really expecting decent quality out of this when it came to video. Turns out it does a pretty decent job.We are very satisfied with this and would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great all around camera
Reviews.Author: Frank Devine
Reviews.Content: We bought this before taking a trip to Bonaire. Use this thing extensively while snorkeling and had no problems. While it's not your professional underwater camera, it didn't cost $1000s either. Both still and video were great and we had the time of our lives and have the pictures and video to remember it by.

Reviews.Title: Five stars for "POU"
Reviews.Author: Jake
Reviews.Content: This camera is indeed waterproof as stated in description, has plenty of adjustment to get that "perfect picture" and is very easy to get the hang of to use once you read the instructions of course.  One thing negative, the battery life is very short so keep up on the charging or buy spare batteries! Also it has a very well built sturdy feeling and the GPS works very well outdoors but no so much indoors, why would you want it indoors it is almost an outdoors specific camera anyways.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: BLS-Bikes
Reviews.Content: Just got back from a long europe trip and unit worked fine. fast to turn on and easy to alter the settings. Have not printed any pics yet. Only odd thing was once when it would not turn off. I finally pulled the battery. After that it was fine and it only did that once.

Reviews.Title: It was a present
Reviews.Author: M. Moise "Magalie"
Reviews.Content: It was a present for my dad and he is very happy with it has he is a diver .... I always go for nikon and I'm always pleased

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Ranch.
Reviews.Author: Judy Duncan
Reviews.Content: Been having problems with regular video/picture cameras while using them at the ranch, mainly because the ranch is extremely dusty most of the time.  While sending one of my video cameras back again for repairs,(Which always takes about two months to get it back.) a friend suggested getting a water proof camera, because if it keeps the water out, it would probably keep the dust out as well.  The camera is simple enough to use, takes great pictures, and surprisingly good video.  Another added plus, the camera seems very durable especially while riding and training horses, which at times the horses and I can be very rough on just about anything we come into contact with.  I know the main selling point of the camera is the waterproofing, but I can see other using it in a multiple conditions, such as construction, and folks that live and work in dry dusty conditions.  Very good camera and the price is not bad either.

Reviews.Title: Works in the dirt and the wind
Reviews.Author: Melinda
Reviews.Content: Got this for my boyfriend who takes it on his horse trips, dirtbike rides, hikes, etc.  Been dropped and rained on and still works beautifully. And needless to say it was the perfect color!

Reviews.Title: Expected
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I got what I expected on this camera. It's not amazing like some reviews may claim, but a good quality product that I am happy with as long as it holds up.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera with lots of Extras
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was hopping that this camera would be the ticket between a bulky SLR and a point and shoot. During a vacation with three teenagers throuigh Disney the camera worked perfectly to capture great shots. Easy to use and good pictures and you can make lots of adjustments or use the pre set adjustments. Flash works well. You can shoot fill flash too. The only minus was that the screen became scratched in my pocket, something in these days of high strength glass for phones you wouild thing something that strong would be on this cool camera. But, it isn't bad and I'll be happy to have the camera with or without the scratch.

Reviews.Title: Hers in orange, mine in camp!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my fiancé and she loves it. I have a camera with an external zoom and it's effected by dust to such a degree that it started messing up on our vacation. Now looking forward to using the Nikon!!

Reviews.Title: Great Images
Reviews.Author: Angel G.
Reviews.Content: This camera is so convenient and worry free.  Pictures are coming out great.  This camera is the talk of everyone.

Reviews.Title: Still a point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Conrad
Reviews.Content: I have about $5k worth of nikon dslr equipment. Image quality from this camera is good, not dslr good. I purchased this for a trip to Hawaii to take where I wouldn't take my big camera. Focus is quick for a point at shoot.

Reviews.Title: Untested yet
Reviews.Author: NannyInTexas
Reviews.Content: It arrived and all was as stated. Charged the battery, took some pics, and so far so good. I haven't had a chance to test it underwater yet but hope to this week end. If it performs the same underwater, I will love it!! It's a good, small, manageable size.7/29 - Update: Took the camera with us to Destin and used it underwater. It performed GREAT!! We never reached the depth limit of 35'.  as we were just over 25'.  NO problems and the picture quality is better than I expected. All around I have to give it a 5 star rating!! Worked as advertised - no problems with battery life what so ever. I definitely recommend this camera!!

Reviews.Title: Well, it's waterproof
Reviews.Author: Beverly S "Christian"
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed in this camera.  I thought for this much money that it would take better pictures than it did.  My cellphone takes better pictures!  The range on the lens is not very much, and the viewfinder is difficult to see through.  But I did try it underwater and it was waterproof!  I was in the ocean and nothing came out except mirky pictures, but I am going to try it in a pool to see if I actually get a picture.

Reviews.Title: Very Sleek
Reviews.Author: windy247
Reviews.Content: I think this is a good looking camera period. Now throw in the waterproof part...AWESOME. TAKES GREAT PICTURES. I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix AW100
Reviews.Author: Sebastian
Reviews.Content: I found it too plastic, but that's not a real problem at all (It's just that I prefer metal cases).

Reviews.Title: CAMERA
Reviews.Author: RAFA_DOC
Reviews.Content: THIS CAMERA ITS AMAZING I REALLY LIKE IT. THE PICTURES ARE REALLY PRETTY AND ITS VERY SMALLBYE BYE. TAKE CARE

Reviews.Title: worked great for me
Reviews.Author: anniebananie
Reviews.Content: I  was thrilled with the performance overall.  I'm hoping it lasts as long as my non-waterproof CoolPix, a camera I also love for its ease of use and clarity of image (3 years and still going).  Getting high-quality underwater pics of organisms was important for a biology-geology class we taught in the Bahamas this summer, and this little gem performed beautifully for me.  However my colleague bought an identical camera that leaked and quit after 2 days of taking snorkel snapshots.  She had bought insurance; I hadn't.  I nervously used it the rest of the 2 weeks, downloading images every day in case it leaked and died.The max. picture size is great as we plan to use organism images on student posters to be given at scientific meetings.Much easier to use and handle than a larger camera in a plastic housing.  IMHO, if you're careless with things or nervous, you might buy the insurance. I was wishing I had just in case...

Reviews.Title: OK camera but always overexposed images
Reviews.Author: John  Blonsick
Reviews.Content: Nice to use around water BUT the camera always overexposes images - have to tweak the settings every time it shuts down - waste of time in a fast photo setting like kayaking where seconds mean capturing the wildlife images or not.

Reviews.Title: GREAT camera
Reviews.Author: A. Crandall
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome little camera.  I bought this one after my previous camera was dropped and broken on Mt. Rainier.  I travel often and walk a lot.  This is a lightweight camera that "does it all".  I don't have to worry if it rains because this camera is not only shock proof, but also water resistant.  It takes great pictures and uploads easily.  I have recommended it to numerous friends who hike and travel.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX AW100 16 MP CMOS Waterproof Digital Camera with GPS and Full...
Reviews.Author: ryan p
Reviews.Content: I love it works great. I use it in the surf. during the day. At night have a little trouble needs for light

Reviews.Title: Waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: Camera worked great in the water and took excellent pictures (except for operator errors). Camera functions were easy to learn and use. I would highly recommend buying this camera if you plan to go snorkeling.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: JHEnsor
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son as a wedding gift. They took it to Jamaica on the honeymoon and love it. Great quality photos above as well as below water.

Reviews.Title: Great Camara
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: Takes great picture very clear  and crisp.  We tried it underwater and it works fine.  I would recommend this camera

Reviews.Title: Survived Hawaii!
Reviews.Author: M. Artmann
Reviews.Content: I bought this just before a trip to Hawaii because I didn't want to take my Nikon D60 into the ocean (makes sense, right?).  This camera took great pictures in and out of the water.  I carried it everywhere because of its size and the fact that it tended to randomly rain there and I still wanted to take pictures.  The battery lasts a very reasonable amount of time.  Only had to charge it a few times while on vacation (I was hoping I wouldn't regret not getting an extra battery)!

Reviews.Title: I bough this as a complementary camera to my DSLR
Reviews.Author: Maria B. Bejar
Reviews.Content: Macro is great, fast focusing, long battery life.I bought this as a camera that "I wouldn't care to break" and so far I'm impressed with the quality of both the product and the pictures.  Not the best camera on low light situations but for a day at the river or the park it is a trooper.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly
Reviews.Author: 2K1Toaster
Reviews.Content: I read lots of reviews on underwater cameras, and the part I was most concerned about was the service hatch for the battery and memory card. This camera has the best door to date. It latches with a swivel, so you cannot accidentally pop it open underwater. I dove into the water with it from a high platform and swam in coral. Took it with me everywhere and it was great. The picture quality is superb and we used it for every photograph even the ones nowhere near water.Which brings up the point, if you want to have a carefree vacation, buy this camera. The only piece of electronics I had on me was this camera which meant that I did not have to care what I could and could not do around water while vacationing by the beach. If I wanted to jump in I did. I didn't have to stop and think about taking out my cell phone or car keys or anything. It made everything very pleasant and I am still using it at home for normal pictures. The Panoramic photos are stitched together very well too.

Reviews.Title: surprisingly good waterproof point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Phoebe Furber
Reviews.Content: Purchased the camera for an over seas trip, but also used the item for a Hawaiian vacation. The camera was used in and out of cold waterfalls, toted along as i jumped from a 20 ft drop into a water hole mixed with sea and fresh water; as well as snorkeling off a beach without ever fogging up. the camera froze on me once, had to go back to shore, patted the battery compartment dry before opening and forced the camera to power cycle manually, went back within a few minutes in to the ocean without a hitch. The battery life depends on usage, i found that with the GPS function as well as movie mode drained the battery quicker than without those functions being used, but i still was able to get one days worth of vacation shooting on a 4 gb card. The GPS function is definitely helpful when you get back home from vacation in order to remember the places you've been. sometimes it takes the camera some time 10-15 minutes before the camera picks up your location depending on your over head cover. The camera does surprisingly well in low light conditions as well as 5-10 ft shots underwater, the colors at 5-10ft still come up well and require minimal color correction through Photoshop. The weakness is long distance evening shot focus, but i didn't really expect the camera to have that ability, manual focus is usually more precise; i couldn't find that function on the camera, will continue to play around with the camera to see if that function exists. Additional functions that would be helpful would be delayed shot capability for night shots, i figure that could be a software function update. Overall I would recommend this camera albeit it's price.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Eric Saltzer
Reviews.Content: So far, it is performing excellent.  No problems whatsoever.There should be no minimum of words required for commenting.  I am not going to rate if I have to write a story on each product

Reviews.Title: Orange Nikon Coolpix Camera
Reviews.Author: Sherri Lackey "Author of The Narcissus Legacy...
Reviews.Content: My kids gave this to me for my birthday and I've been taking pictures whenever I can. I have yet to learn how to use all of the features. I haven't tried the GPS function yet. I have taken photos and videos, all of which turned out pretty well. I say pretty well because my daughter uses a DSLR and I'm used to the quality of photos she takes with her camera. That said, the Coolpix is not a DSLR obviously, but it does its job well for the type of camera that it is. I used the panorama feature today and I'm quite pleased with that. It gave me the choice of 180 or 360 degree panorama. The description said that action shots should not be blurry, so I tested that out and it worked well. I'm happy with my little camera!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: debbied "DD"
Reviews.Content: spot on and is water proof in water and salt water. took to Caribbean and had it in water and snorkeling took great pics and movies. the neck strap is nice to carry it with, even under water.

Reviews.Title: It definitely works.. just not well.
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: By way of background, I'm the quintessential "pro-sumer". I have enough interest and ability to appreciate good equipment and make use of it; but not enough to invest in super-high-end equipment. My workhorse is a Nikon D80, but I don't suffer from brand loyalty the way some photogs do; my backup P+S is a Canon powershot, with which I've been extremely satisfied.Bottom line first: I was disappointed with this camera, and actually a little surprised at just how disappointed. For almost $300, I think it should perform better; I'm not expecting a top-quality image, but it should at least compete with the basic point-and-shoots. I figured that this would end up replacing my Canon as my backup camera, but basically I've ended up with a D-SLR, a P+S, and now a waterproof camera that I will only be using when I don't want to expose the other two to the elements. However, it does do one thing well: it's a tough cam, and it's proven itself very well in this regard. I've used it in the pool and on the beach so far, and haven't had any issues whatsoever.PROS: can be summed up as, it does what it's technically supposed to- Definitely feels solid in my hand. No question about whether it's going to fall apart on me.- Haven't had even a hint of moisture seep into it after pretty extensive use in somewhat rough waves (only caveat is that I haven't taken it any deeper than 5 feet so far)- GPS is a very handy feature. I never really thought I'd need or want it (geotagging is disabled on my phone), but it's really nice having an extra GPS unit when you're, say, kayaking and don't have your phone on you.CONS: can be summed up as, it doesn't do it well- Autofocus is pitiful at times. I have no idea what it's trying to focus on sometimes. I've tried adjusting the settings, and so far it seems that the continuous AF mode is absolutely useless (so much for action shots).- There's no auto-bracket. Seems like an easy feature to include. I am kind of shocked that it's not available.- The auto-rotate feature makes no sense to me whatsoever. Some photos are rotated on the camera's display (even though I'd prefer to disable that, but can't because it's not an option), but when I import them to my computer they need to be manually rotated. And again, very inconsistent. You can take the same shot several times in a row, and some are displayed vertical vs some horizontal.- The menus are not at all intuitive. Maybe I'm being critical, but on my D80 there are probably 5-6x as many entries, and somehow they're better organized than this. It makes it even more apparent that this menu is poorly organized, because its similar design reminds me of the D80, and how it COULD be better.- This one is really weird... I think there's a "feature" where if you shake the camera while in playback mode, it scrolls to the next image. Sometimes it goes forward, and sometimes it goes back. I haven't figured out a consistent way to make one vs the other happen. At first I thought my D-pad buttons were malfunctioning, but it definitely doesn't do this in any mode other than playback. I've tried to disable this in the menus, but unless it's somehow hidden (which I doubt, I've really given this some effort), I don't think this is something you can turn off. What's more, it's really inconsistent in how sensitive it is. I'm just waiting for the day that the photo switches right as I'm pushing the DELETE button and end up getting rid a photo I actually liked.- Oh, and in case the last point is related to the "action control" button: I've disabled this too. Some reviewers seem to really like it. It's every bit as gimmicky as it sounds. Yes, it lets you make a VERY LIMITED number of adjustments; but by the time you've shake-scrolled your way through the menu, you might as well have taken off your gloves and done it the right way.

Reviews.Title: nikon coolpix camera/ with gps
Reviews.Author: brenda darnell
Reviews.Content: i love this camera -it takes fantastic pictures-im documenting and old road that run thru alabama with it and its been great for that--fantastic camera

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: colleen
Reviews.Content: I love the camera but all the manuals were in Japanese which i do not know the language. Luckily I was able to download the manual off the web.

Reviews.Title: Good quality
Reviews.Author: howard darbon
Reviews.Content: Good quality and easy to use.  Particularly useful to carry as a back up to my DSLR.  Produces high standard pictures.

Reviews.Title: Fun to use
Reviews.Author: marilyn ruecking
Reviews.Content: I'm an amateur obviously and this camera is fun to use and meets my needs. Caution: I still haven't figured out the utility of the GPS but I know it quickly draws down my battery.  Since I lost my previous camera, my first photo was of a PC screen showing my name address phone #. Maybe if I misplace this one I can get it back?

Reviews.Title: I expected more¡
Reviews.Author: Carlos Alberto Poe
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because wanted to have a Nikon one, normaly I bought a Canon cameras or Sony's and this time give the oportunity to Nikon, I do not really know what happened to Nikon enterprise, but the products do not fill my requirements, sorry Nikon¡ slow to focus and shooter speed, do not capture well in low light, does not feel strong enought to be a shock proof camera.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera so far
Reviews.Author: CountryGirl04
Reviews.Content: I love the camera so far. It takes good pics. But I havent tried it underwater yet. I took it camping the other weekend and noticed that the screen is already scratched.

Reviews.Title: Takes decent photos
Reviews.Author: ☢
Reviews.Content: This camera wont win any awards with the photos it takes, but it does the job if you need a rugged camera. The buttons on the back feel flimsy and there are not manual settings for taking photos. Overall it is an average point and shoot that is unique because it can handle abuse, water, and dirt. I use this camera to take photos at ARMY training events. GPS works well, but is confusing to navigate. Also, GPS drains the battery very fast.

Reviews.Title: Great quality
Reviews.Author: WWCitizen
Reviews.Content: Great quality photos and water tight. I've used this once so far, and plan to use it more frequently this coming summer - bought it for a trip to Puerto Rico, but we didn't make it to the mangroves in the south west as expected. :-(  That's where I wanted to use the camera.

Reviews.Title: Another great camera.
Reviews.Author: Teresa
Reviews.Content: I purchased an orange one for my husband a year ago at Costco.  He loves it kayaking and when we snorkel.  This one was on sale for $159.....$200 less than the orange camera.  So I purchased it.  The camo color doesn't bother me, but I have placed a large orange sticker on the front to help me locate it.  Great camera and we no longer have to pass the other camera back/forth in the ocean when we snorkel.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for use while kayaking
Reviews.Author: M. W. Gill
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera in order to spare my big boy camera the exposure to kayaking, hiking, horseback riding, etc. I have taken wonderful photos with it and I am quite pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished cool pix
Reviews.Author: ml
Reviews.Content: Like new!  Camera works great and came with all the accessories. It is user friendly and yet has many custom features.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix
Reviews.Author: Everyday
Reviews.Content: It took great pictures and underwater video in Aruba! We used the strap a lot and had to tie it on so we didn't drop it. I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: It's good
Reviews.Author: Anna Luiza Lobão Gonçalves
Reviews.Content: This camera is very good! I recommend it because it takes beautifull photos and it's easy to use. So if you buy it, you will love it!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera. Until it fried
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer

} cv_mo1RTRSFU5DVDS1preplay.onmouseout = function() { cv_mo1RTRSFU5DVDS1preplay.src = "http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/81d4QVyCllS._SX320_PHcustomer-video-vignette_PIvideo-reviews-bottom,BottomLeft,0,43_OU01_PIcustomer-video-play,BottomLeft,130,-12_CR0,0,0,0_.png"; } var node = cv_mo1RTRSFU5DVDS1preplay.parentNode; var cv_mo1RTRSFU5DVDS1currentClick = node.onclick; node.onclick = function () { var head = document.getElementsByTagName("head"); if (head[0]) { var logTag = document.createElement('script'); logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo1RTRSFU5DVDS1currentClick) { return cv_mo1RTRSFU5DVDS1currentClick(); } } } Length:: 0:32 MinsThese Nikon point and shoot waterproof cameras are so crappy. I wanted one and showed my girlfriend and she bought one for herself. I bought mine about a month later. That was summer of 2012. We used the cameras a number of times in the water (both fresh and salt) without a problem until May of 2013. Then things went bad. See updates for details.Update: 7/1/13: The camera worked well for about 9 months. Went to Maui in May and on the second day it fried. Was on a snorkeling trip off the coast of Lanai. About 30 minutes in the water it stopped working, took about 15 minutes to get back to the boat. I noticed that the focus assist light was flashing erratically, I dried it off and opened the battery compartment and could smell something had burned inside. After I got home, I sent it to Nikon for repair. They had to replace most of the electronics in the camera.My girlfriend's camera stopped working on the last snorkeling trip that week. It was getting "foggy" trying to take photos. Last week she grabbed her camera and it will not turn on, tried several batteries with no luck. She has not sent it back to Nikon yet, update on that when I know more.Not happy that two (2) AW-100 died on one trip. If it wasn't for having my Go-Pro with me, I wouldn't have gotten any good underwater shots. I will be much more cautious with the AW-100. May never take it into the water again though.Update: 3/10/14: After about 8 months of not using the AW100 that Nikon had repaired in the water, I went swimming in a pool and took the camera with me. I only submerged the camera a couple of times and only went maybe a foot or two under water. Camera started leaking immediately. These cameras suck, the waterproofing is a joke, I'm buying a Canon now. I will never buy a Nikon water camera again.The attached video shows the water moving around inside the camera. Also, I live in Nevada, in a very dry environment, there should not have been any condensation inside the camera when I changed the battery an hour before going in the water.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Harry G.
Reviews.Content: I used the underwater camera for the first time on a Maui vacation and it worked exceedingly well particularly for a first time user.  The pictures of fish and turtles were awsome. I also used the camera above ground and the sunset shots were great. I think Nikon has come up with a winner.

Reviews.Title: Survives
Reviews.Author: Prime Reviewer
Reviews.Content: This camera takes pretty good photos and great videos.  I have it in the water (salt and fresh) about  7 different days.  I haven't tried to protect it in any ways and it holds up well.  I didn't use it over 12 feet deep.  I used a 64GB  microSD w/adapter and the capacity is phenomenal - had an entire vacation on it.

Reviews.Title: best reviewed
Reviews.Author: Kurt J Bulicek
Reviews.Content: haven't used extensively yet but all reviews were excellent & Nikon makes some of the best digital imaging products available.  need rugged, compact, versatile device for traveling & this fits all the required criteria + HD 1080p video, easy media export, GPS (although GPS isn't stellar so far but ill need to experiment further), & zoom.  bought the insurance through Amazon's recommended provider which in the past has proven a good choice if issues arise.  will test abroad on vacation more thoroughly later this year but so far so good!

Reviews.Title: Does what it promises
Reviews.Author: Amanda Jacob
Reviews.Content: I've taken it snorkeling underwater several times now. It still works perfectly! And the underwater photos and videos I got look just as good as the ones in their advertisements. Takes fantastic pictures outdoors, too. My wife has a Canon point-and-shoot that has a slightly better sensor - hers really works well for indoor shots and nighttime photos. But this is AMAZING for its ability to work underwater, in the rain, and all sorts of outdoor things. Plus it's shockproof so I don't need to be paranoid about drops and spills.

Reviews.Title: Worthwile for it's quality and price.
Reviews.Author: Trent
Reviews.Content: Easy to opeate and good for hiking with it without considering too much on proection.Menu should be upgraded for better apperance.

Reviews.Title: Looks and works great
Reviews.Author: justsomeguy
Reviews.Content: no regrets on buying this camera, It has GPS!!The Software that comes with seems not to be compatible with windows 8, but I am fairly sure the website has a compatible version for you to download

Reviews.Title: Excellent waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: Connie Koehler
Reviews.Content: We used this camera in pools and hot tubs so far, no leaks what so ever.  Takes pretty good pictures also.

Reviews.Title: Great cam for a trip
Reviews.Author: Pmatadragon
Reviews.Content: This camera is not a professional one but the performance is ok, be careful with the screen is easy to scratshs!

Reviews.Title: Sometimes water gets in
Reviews.Author: potameid
Reviews.Content: I'm on my second one of these.  I use them for white water kayaking.  For such a rugged camera the optics are impressive.  While they do take a beating, the first one somehow took on water in the battery compartment while it was still under warranty.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX AW100 16 MP CMOS Waterproof Digital Camera with GPS
Reviews.Author: Paul Jonason
Reviews.Content: So far picture quality seems good. It does help to hold the camera steady for sharp images. I shoot from my kayak with one hand so the small controls may be a bit tricky to get used to. I found myself turning the camera off by accident and my buddy shot video not knowing. It was ok, testing is how you find out. It does have a nice pano feature you can hand hold but works best from a level tripod. It shot some detail shots of some old cars at a winery and they looked quite sharp. This camera is only a bit bigger than my Iphone so it is easy to carry around and has many image profiles to pick from. Large hands may have trouble on the small controls on this model.

Reviews.Title: Cool active camera
Reviews.Author: golSquared
Reviews.Content: Took this camera to Italy for a year. LOVE that its waterproof, shock proof, and durable...came in handy. But the display isn't scratch proof. Photo quality is good, but not spectacular and not much room to manipulate settings, but there are A LOT of settings. I really like this camera for its physical capacity, but not anything out of the ordinary in quality of photos.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Underwater Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for a Caribbean Cruise we were taking.  Took this camera to the beach and into the ocean.  The quality of the pictures was great.

Reviews.Title: Durable!
Reviews.Author: Emily
Reviews.Content: After reading many many many reviews of waterproof cameras, I decided to go with this one.  It's proven to be very durable and takes amazing pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Jennifer McKiney
Reviews.Content: We use this camera for business use.  I purchased this because of the different climants we live in.  These camera's are hard to come by that is why I chose to purchase this way.

Reviews.Title: Great for snorkeling video, outdoors, so-so still picture quality
Reviews.Author: Chris Ukes
Reviews.Content: If based on snorkeling, water parks, and underwater pool shots/video, I'd give it Five Stars.But the image sensor has difficulty with dynamic range and sharp focus in still images...in short, no better than an average smart phone, precisely because it has a cellphone sensor and lens system... 1-Star, inconsistent image quality.  Adjusting the exposure down on-camera or using a neutral density filter w/ the filter attachment helps, but isn't foolproof either. The new AW110 update has the same sensor and lens, so CAVEAT EMPTOR.The GPS feature also gets 5-stars and is the best of all current manufacturers.  In Hawaii, it tagged coordinates to each photo, as well as, the locations name - very nice!!!  The unique map viewer feature is also neat when hiking in parks, etc.  No other manufacturer features a GPS map viewer!I paid less than $200 on clearance for the AW100 w/o regret, but would recommend the Olympus TG-2 in the $350 range over the AW110 for an all-purpose waterproof camera - the sensor/lens system of the Olympus is much better.One tip: If shooting fish underwater, taking snapshots from video on computer yields the best results.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Lindsey "Lindsey"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my husband and he loves it. We took it on vacation to Hawaii and he got some great underwater photos while snorkeling. I'm no expect in photography but this will work perfect for us.

Reviews.Title: Looking for the next adventure
Reviews.Author: David A. Jimenez Xolalpa "DJphilomath"
Reviews.Content: I like this camera. I have taken photos in rain and underwater with no problems. When underwater I usually forget that the water makes things look closer, so be careful when you are taking photos out and underwater. Remove the zoom. It fits in my pocket perfectly.I have taken some videos. The microphone is not that good and the image is a bit grain but it does the job. It is very helpful the led light it has for dark conditions.It doesn't include a wrist strap; I had to buy one.What I don't like of this camera is the Easy Auto Mode. It is not so accurate to detect when a scene is dark and in movement. I have taken a lot of blurry photos because it chose to use a higher exposure time and no flash in dark environments. So for low light conditions, it's better to choose the mode.

Reviews.Title: camara
Reviews.Author: Henry Rangosch
Reviews.Content: exelente foto, diseño cool, buena pintura de camuflaje, es un buen equipo, me gusta mucho y a un muy buen precio

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Nora Cox
Reviews.Content: Having a good time with this camera. Works underwater just as they say! The best scene setting is the 'museum" setting as it works very well through  glass cases and other indoor situations. Still learning all the features but happy so far.

Reviews.Title: excellent camera.
Reviews.Author: carlos carrion romero
Reviews.Content: excellent camera.This camera is amazing and takes underwater use clear photos and HD video is excellent, you can download the recording speed, I recommend

Reviews.Title: CoolPIX is Cool....easy to use...
Reviews.Author: Linda Gaspar-Evans
Reviews.Content: CoolPIX AW100 camera is easy to use...intuitive.....good quality photos....you will enjoy using it!!!  ENJOY your photo taking experience!!!  good size for transporting on your outings...

Reviews.Title: Great all purpose camera
Reviews.Author: Master Woo
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera vs the Panasonic because i saw how well it performed under water.  A friend had one in Mexico where i was snorkeling and show me pics from underwater and it came out like any other clear daytime pics.  Now i'm headed back to Cancun and will be taking one myself.Review Addendum:  This camera takes phenomenal pictures in/out of water.  Numerous pic settings provide all types of picture quality.  Panoramic assist is an absolute great feature.  Vids are great with high quality recordings.  See Pic.

Reviews.Title: Pretty cool thus far
Reviews.Author: Aaron Guy
Reviews.Content: Took it on it's first underwater adventure to South Beach Miami in March and it did pretty well. Took a bunch of underwater pics in the ocean and so far so good. I was a bit concerned about sand getting into the creases of it, but I don't think it has been affected by it... yet. Taking it to Puerto Rico next month... hopefully it holds up just as well.

Reviews.Title: Not trully waterproof, not good at night
Reviews.Author: ANDRE BITAR SANTA ROSA
Reviews.Content: The first impression was good. Lightweight, good looking with a nice screen. But after using it is not even close of what I expected. When you take pictures underwater, the lens gets fog and you need to let it under the sun to get better. When taking pictures at night in the Automatic function, the pictures gets a lot of bubbles and when you put it in the night picture mode, it is hard to get a good picture. The camera is also a little slow to access the pictures and to take pictures in sequence. The overall review is that the camera was way below my expectations for a Nikon waterproof camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Michael Carey
Reviews.Content: Takes good pics on land, has lots of attachments for use in the dry, and it works very well as a snorkeling camera.  We got some great shots.  This camera held up for two weeks at the ocean, and was wet almost every day.  I think it got some very minor moisture in the camera body as there was a bit of condensation on the inside of the lens, but it still kept working.  I hope that did not cause damage to the electrical components.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: William G Weyand
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera.  Takes great pictures, easy to use, and fits easily in your pocket.  I haven't used it in the water, but I would not hesitate to do so.

Reviews.Title: really awesome
Reviews.Author: PUKE13
Reviews.Content: this camera exceeded my expectations and it looks so awesome!!although the battery holder/memory card looks like if i go into waterthe gauge will cause a leak..doesnt look that tight sealed..

Reviews.Title: nice multiple purpose camera
Reviews.Author: Daniel L. Swanson "The Dawg"
Reviews.Content: We just took the camera to San Pedro Belize.  It was nice to throw it in my pocket and not worry if I waded into the ocean or sat in a pool with the camera still in the pocket.  I am still getting used to the settings and had trouble using the flash but I just need to look back at the instructions. It is also easy to put a finger in front of the lens without realizing it.  I took it snorkeling and got some great pictures.  If you plan to use it after you have been in the water, make sure you dry it off carefully because I had some pictures that had "smears" on them because of water droplets on the lens.  The battery life seems to be good. It is easy to view pictures.  I wish it came with a wrist strap but I added one for next to nothing so that was no big deal.  Overall I am glad we bought the camera and think it was worth what I paid.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good!
Reviews.Author: Luciana De B. Neves "Luciana"
Reviews.Content: I am not using it for a long time, but at least what I have tried showed me that it is a really nice camera! Great pics and video! I have already took pics under water and it was good too! ;)I did not like the battery charger because it has very long wire, making a lot of volume to take on trips!That's it!

Reviews.Title: Not as I expected
Reviews.Author: M@C
Reviews.Content: This is a camera full of features with high quality materials and finishing but I didn't like it due to the very poor quality photos it takes (especially indoors). My iPhone camera takes far better photos. The software is not very friendly, lot of shooting modes without significant difference and missing fluorescent mode to improve indoor photos.Video recording is for 29 mins maximum.

Reviews.Title: perfect if you want to take the most amazing submarine pictures.. even record under water.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best cameras that i've ever bought, Perfect if you go to travel to Galapagos Islands, Great pictures under water and on land at day or night. love it love it..

Reviews.Title: Did a great job in Belize!
Reviews.Author: S. Brown
Reviews.Content: I'm no camera expert but it did a great job (on land and underwater) on my trip last week to Belize! There was a period of about15-30 minutes after snorkeling one day when the lens fogged up but luckily with a digital camera you can view pictures as you go along (and it's a good thing that there wasn't any once in a lifetime pictures that I missed) so I was able to go back and capture some shots. It took very nice clear pictures and there was no wondering and hoping a picture would turn out well after being developed.

Reviews.Title: Best investment ive made!!!!
Reviews.Author: Scott a
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best camera ive ever owned. I fully expcect it to be my last. It takes pics that are as good as being there. the panoramic feature is great. the gps works great but can kill the battery quickly. I recommend turning it off unless you plan on taking a pic you want to gps pin. the hd video is clear and the sound crisp. the shock proof and waterproof make it a great outdoorsman camera.

Reviews.Title: Snow Sports
Reviews.Author: Katya Tertung
Reviews.Content: So glad I found this camera before a trip to Canadian Rockies! So easy to use,tough, holds charge and is super attractive too. Wore it under my jacket on snowboarding and dog sledding days took great on the move videos.Loved it! Met and exceeded my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Underwater Camera
Reviews.Author: RickG "Rick"
Reviews.Content: Underwater Camera. Seals look adequate,I will keep them whetted with divers silicone.Seems to take wonderful pictures and videos.Files are .JPG and .MOVFreemake is MY editing (free) software of choice.It came with some software that I did not try.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Leroy
Reviews.Content: Takes good pictures both inside and outside.  The GPS option is great!  It always lets you know right where you're taking a picture, not just the city but the exact business, landmark, or whatever point you're taking the picture at.  Haven't tried out the "waterproof-ness" yet but it seems to be sealed really well with the battery and USB card all in one place.

Reviews.Title: Great pictures of Colorado trip
Reviews.Author: Todd P. Saunders "Common sense"
Reviews.Content: Lived up to expectations!Loved the GPS featureLoved the colorVery useful in wet environments or snowy climates.Buy it!

Reviews.Title: Underwater, snow, rain, dropped it
Reviews.Author: The King
Reviews.Content: This is one awesome camera! It takes great videos (HDp) and great pictures. I've gone snuba diving, snorkling, swimming, skiing, hiking, biking... Dropped it many times and it still works great! I thought for sure I killed it when I dropped it in the snow when it was literally freezing out side. It survived. Great camera.

Reviews.Title: great camera for general use
Reviews.Author: clarence brown
Reviews.Content: would recomend this product,for a general use camera,hunting,fishing and back yard adventures,pocket handy and light to carry,a memory card and your ready to go

Reviews.Title: Loved it
Reviews.Author: Harold E Nichless
Reviews.Content: I took it on a Caribbean cruise and it was wonderful. Pictures are good quality. Used it snorkeling and also while riding "The Raging River" at a water park.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: eriel
Reviews.Content: Tomas buenas foto. Fácil manejo. El GPS le fuera brutal. Los video tienen muy buena calidad. Excelente para deportes de agua. La recomiendo.

Reviews.Title: WOW!!
Reviews.Author: Snick "Snick"
Reviews.Content: I actually  bought this camera for my husband to use in the field for work.  He really likes it.  I ma;y have to borrow it from him some time.  The fact that the camera is waterproof is a great big plus in his line of work.

Reviews.Title: Cool Cam
Reviews.Author: Tyler Gruber
Reviews.Content: Great camera at a pretty good price. Took snorkeling photos with it and it worked beautifully. Battery life not stellar but as long as you charge it regularly you'll be fine.

Reviews.Title: Phenomenal camera...
Reviews.Author: Michael A.  Cavenas
Reviews.Content: The picture quality and ease of operation are asounding....tested the "shockproof" and "freeze proof" early on by accident.  Recommended it to 2 other friends who bought it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Kathy Gibson
Reviews.Content: Love it -- still figuring out all it can do but the pictures are great.  I would recommend this camera to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Performing As Anticipated
Reviews.Author: omegaet
Reviews.Content: The AW100 was purchased as a shooting companion to my D7000.  As a rugged little 'point & shoot', I couldn't ask for more.  I have used in in wet and rainy environments and I have taken it under water (just to test the results).....no problems.  I will be leaving for the Peruvian Amazon soon, I am feel confident the AW100 will perform as anticipated.

Reviews.Title: Excelente!
Reviews.Author: Qaiq Alves Rodrigues
Reviews.Content: Amazing! This camera is more perfect. Zoom, CMOS, zoom, GPS, share, FullHD films... Perfect! Recomendes. I Buy more, later. 100!

Reviews.Title: Great compact camera
Reviews.Author: Mark T
Reviews.Content: This camera does everything I could ever want in a smart compact camera. It's durable, impact resistant and waterproof, what more could you ask for? I'm very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: I was not happy with this camera.
Reviews.Author: R. Stevens "rleesbooks"
Reviews.Content: I was not happy with this camera. I bought it for a trip we were going on.  As soon as I turned it on and took the first picture, it was blurry.  I thought I  would give it a try though. I read the manual and tried to change the settings.  The speed is slow, and processing of the picture is slow.  Out of 5 pictures I would take (whatever I was photographing), probably 3 would come out blurry and 1-2 would be a keeper.  I would spend more time deleting pictures, and missing opportunities to capture a picture perfect moment.  I would have to tell my subjects to remain very still while taking a picture. Not easy when you have a 2 year old. Even using the "sports"  option didn't work.  Images were blurred and overly bright or dark.The only pros I can see is that it is waterproof (although I haven't checked this) and is supposed to be shockproof.I own a Nikon D5000, and am happy with it.  I was hoping Nikon would have done better with a point and shoot, but I have owned Casio point and shoot cameras that took better pictures, and were faster and more efficient (also less expensive) than this one.I honestly wish I could send it back and get my money back.

Reviews.Title: Excelent product
Reviews.Author: Alonso Ugarte Vera
Reviews.Content: Es muy versátil y funciona bien fuera y dentro del agua, excelente producto y tardo muy poco tiempo en llegar

Reviews.Title: Easy to use digital waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: rsebrewster "Roni"
Reviews.Content: Nice and easy to use and it takes quality pics.  Only one negative ordering from a company in Japan and that is the Booklet about the camera is in Japanese only and while there is a CD in English, I like to have the actual booklet when I travel to answer any questions that may arise since I don't always travel with my computer.

Reviews.Title: Pretty spendy
Reviews.Author: Tezinnv
Reviews.Content: I wish I could say that this camera is worth every penny, but the fact is that while it is waterproof and shockproof the actual pix and videos are seldom crisp and clear. Underwater pictures usually need to be in telephoto which drains the battery incredibly. I had one experience where it wouldn't turn off until I opened it up and removed the battery. This is just not something one likes to do when snorkeling in the Pacific!

Reviews.Title: Love it for what it is
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Ambrosius
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital camera.  Love being able to download pictures on my computer and then to Facebook and emails.  Good quality pictures most of the time.  Not so great in low light, but I didn't expect that from this camera.  Great for scenery and ok for wildlife if it isn't too far away.  At the high end of the magnification the pictures can be grainy and blurry.  Overall a good value.

Reviews.Title: Came with more than expected!
Reviews.Author: Jaimie M Dettmer
Reviews.Content: When I received this camera, I didn't think it was going to come with as many accessories as it did. It was in great condition, and so far is dong really well. I haven't figured everything out about it yet though! I paid for extra shipping and it arrived in 2 days when I thought it was going to take up to 5. Seller was amazing in all areas!

Reviews.Title: A Big Step Up
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Wimbish
Reviews.Content: Still learning to use this camera for my surf fishing pics.  It is a definite step up, but my learning curve and figuring out just what it is capable of is not too far advanced yet.  I am quite satisfied with what I have done with it so far,however,.

Reviews.Title: My son's hunting camera
Reviews.Author: Aiken & Hightower
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my son for christmas. We do alot of hunting, mostly deer, bear and turkey. We used to take pictures with our cell phones. This camera takes pictures that are 10x better than the pictures that we took on our cell phones.

Reviews.Title: best camera on market
Reviews.Author: soundwaveclick
Reviews.Content: i like nikon because they consistently make high-value products at a mild cost.  this camera is no exception.  it has GPS, up to 16 megapixels, macro, imaging options, and memory the size of the SD card that you put in it.  i saw it advertised in National Geographic as a rugged camera.  living up to its reputation, this camera has endured falls and scratches.  while i haven't tested its advertised water resistance, i will assume that this quality is part of the reasonable priced best camera in the price bracket.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Dr. Phillip Huntington III
Reviews.Content: The best camera ever! Arrived on time and was shipped overseas. Withstood the rigors of combat, freezing cold temperatures, submersion and heat. Excellent pictures. Best camera I have ever owned!

Reviews.Title: LOVE this camera
Reviews.Author: Nicole J
Reviews.Content: We took this camera to Hawaii and it was worth every penny.  The pics were great, the clarity was wonderful, and it was easy to use.  Warning:  buy the  writst float because the camera will sink!  My husband gave me a hard time for buying a float since he said a waterproof camera should float but we tested it in shallow water at the beach and she sank like a stone!  Thank goodness SOMEONE thought to buy a wrist float...  :)

Reviews.Title: worked great.
Reviews.Author: Action
Reviews.Content: bought for our honey moon.  survived the under water snorkeling pictures and multiple days on the beach.  would recommend to someone else.

Reviews.Title: Decent camera for the $$
Reviews.Author: T. Mowday "Trace"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a waterproof camera to take to the boat in the summertime and snowmobiling in the winter. The picture quality is ok, but not great. It is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Not a good start...returned it
Reviews.Author: Hippo JSTC "JSTC"
Reviews.Content: Got this camera instead of a competing waterproof camera because it seemed to have better reviews, and was really excited about it. Got a great deal from Costco with a whole bundle and started playing with it immediately. I was looking forward to the waterproof-ness because we were vacationing at the beach soon. Unfortunately, I didn't even get a chance to start using it underwater before it just stopped working! Took some pictures. The shutter speed is way slower than I'm used to, and the 16MP is really not that great. My previous camera was 12.1 MP and the pictures came out clearer and crisper than they did on this camera. Anyways we were using it like normal and one day it just stopped recording pictures. It couldn't have come at a worse time -- during the holidays and it was my son's first holiday season -- so I quickly replaced it with a tried and true Canon. I returned this one since it was clearly dysfunctional and got my money back, thank God! I do not recommend this camera for day to day pictures at all. I'm going back to disposable underwater cameras until Canon makes an alternative -- I will never stray from Canon again!

Reviews.Title: Good image quality, waterproof, some bugs
Reviews.Author: Evgeny Pogorelov
Reviews.Content: The camera itself is solid and takes great photos. Fast power up and can take a beating. However, Nikon's software has some issues with very large capacity SD cards and Macbooks, watch out here. Also the review function on the camera flips back and forth between images at random sometimes which is a slight annoyance but clearly another software bug.

Reviews.Title: Leak and fog
Reviews.Author: Henry E. Dorfman
Reviews.Content: For its genre, this camera shoots quality stuff. But, it does have its drawbacks.The first time I used it for snorkeling (well within its published depth limit), it leaked and fried itself. It seemed to hold up at first, but the moisture worked its way in after 15 minutes.I mainly use waterproof cameras for whitewater kayaking where it's not unusual to have a significant difference between air and water temperature. Lens window fogging is a common problem with this type of camera in these conditions but the Nikon was more vulnerable to it than others I've used.Some of the buttons are a bit difficult to activate with cold, wet fingers. The battery life is adequate.Not a bad choice for light duty. But, it wouldn't be my first choice for more extreme conditions.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera at a Decent Price
Reviews.Author: Tim Pope
Reviews.Content: Works well under water or on dry land. Just be sure to rinse it off good when finished with under water use. Could use a better strap for under water use.

Reviews.Title: Wow! what a price change!
Reviews.Author: looking for great reads
Reviews.Content: The five star is based on a little bit of use just prior to my daughter leaving with it to  Costa Rica for two weeks.  It was easy to set up and to use, pictures looked great.  My son will take it for two months to Viet Nam and China this summer (if daughter hasn't lost it).  I guess we got a great deal, because I paid $170 for it from Amazon.  Am really looking forward to seeing the pictures and videos she will have taken, and will post our feedback more completely at that time.  Hope the floaty strap works for when she inevitably drops it off a reef. . .

Reviews.Title: it is as it says!
Reviews.Author: Red Fox
Reviews.Content: Went to Australia with this camera. It went water just fine. We carried it every where. I have a Nikon D7000 dslr and didnt use it very much. I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: BEst OFF
Reviews.Author: Felipe Montenegro "Felym"
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best purchases, a camera that provides services and especially muschos safe use of extreme and fun. A product of excellent quality, design and functionality, with a clear lens sumanete pun HD technology, GPS and more functions that allows the user to have an experiance of Use

Reviews.Title: Can't find the right words
Reviews.Author: I. Khalil "CCIE Guy"
Reviews.Content: Simply fantastic; nothing more needs to be said.Still have 12 words remaining to be able to submit the review!Oh wait, now I can :-)

Reviews.Title: Exactly as describbed!
Reviews.Author: Nathaniel Boleslawski
Reviews.Content: whats not to love about this thing, its camo, great convo starter and have to wait till its warmer and take it kayaking with me.

Reviews.Title: motherofshutterbug
Reviews.Author: Casey Zillman
Reviews.Content: I got this camera about 2 years ago and bought it specifically for my young children to use.  I read a lot of reviews about the toughness of this camera, being dropped/dunked etc, and thought it would be tough enough for my children.  2 years later, my 4 year old is still taking great and hilarious pictures and the camera is in perfect working shape.  My daughter has dropped it down the stairs, into the toilet, in the mud,snow, and sand, and it even sunk to the bottom of a river.  If it can keep up with our family then it is as tough as they say.  My only qualm is the placement of the lense in the top corner as it gets a lot of finger shots versus a camera with the lense in the middle.  Otherwise, pretty good photos when there is decent light.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Sunrise
Reviews.Content: I already had this camera and bought another one for my girlfriend.  Her and a friend were going on a cruise to the Caribbean and her old digital point and shot broke.  I bought her this one and she was able to get some great underwater shots.  I love this camera!  Easy to use, great picture quality, and extremely rugged.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera to buy
Reviews.Author: AlexisSJO Sanchez Vargas
Reviews.Content: When I received my camera and after I turned on it shows  a little green dot in the screen, but I call AMAZON and they took care, besides that I love the camera because Is very easy to use, and the quality of the pictures is nice, In general the camera is very  nice and I liked a lot

Reviews.Title: Bought it for my wife, she loves it
Reviews.Author: Gregory S. Barber
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife after she (1) dropped it and damaged it then (2) slipped in the salt water and finished it off. Besides being waterproof and shock proof (she hasn't "tested" either feature) she loves the way the new camera handles and she can't wait to go snorkeling to try it.

Reviews.Title: Definitely waterproof!
Reviews.Author: Mary L Thornewell
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a trip to Hawaii. I was sick of the poor quality of the old Kodak underwater cameras, and finding a place to process film is getting more and more difficult. The price tag was reasonable and, after sifting through the reviews, I took the plunge (ha ha, puns).As for being waterproof, this camera did not disappoint. While it was awkward at first to take an electronic device into the water, this camera stood the test. I did not venture to the depths, but for the couple feet of water I was in, this camera performed beautifully.As for picture quality I am pleased. I'm a point-and-shoot kinda girl so I'm not expecting high quality, but for my needs this was great. Plus it was great to not have to worry about getting water or sand or other debris into the camera. Additionally I like the multitude of shooting modes. I tend to leave the camera on auto, but it seems to do a fine job of choosing the appropriate shooting mode. And the panorama mode is pretty neat too!The biggest problem I have with the camera is the placement of the lens. I kept taking photos only to find part of my finger in the picture. I'm not sure if it has anything to do with the fact that I'm left-handed or not. But it is something to be aware of and is pretty easy to fix.Of course, the proprietary charger is a bit annoying as it meant bringing yet another cable with me on vacation, but I survived.Overall, good camera for the money - definitely waterproof - decent quality for a point-and-shoot.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Craig D. Pindell
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome camera.  Especially for knocking around on my motorcycle.  No issues with rain or vibration.  The photos are excellent.  There are more options than can ever be used!

Reviews.Title: Cool Camera
Reviews.Author: VBS
Reviews.Content: Very well built.  Takes great pictures.  My daughter wanted this camera for our trip to the Grand Caymans.  This camera did not disappoint.  I would suggest getting a lanyard that floats if using it in the ocean - though the bright color helps.

Reviews.Title: Perfeita a melhor.
Reviews.Author: Fabiano Moreira Peixoto Fortuna
Reviews.Content: Boa entrega rápida e a melhor câmera do mundo a nikon finalmente acertou. Pode comprar sem medo de ser feliz.

Reviews.Title: Cool camera
Reviews.Author: Mscdex
Reviews.Content: I just received this camera in the mail. I got it to replace a large semi-dslr camera that was too bulky to take out on trips. It looks like a solid camera with some good features. I can't wait to test this out at the beach. It will only go 33ft but from what I have read, you can buy a waterproof bag for it and go do 55ft. Worth a try. The newer model (2013) is suppose to go down 59ft.

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Paulinho! Antal
Reviews.Content: Very good, the quality is one of the better that i saw in this kind of product, you can use it for lots of situations!

Reviews.Title: Boa
Reviews.Author: Lucas Borges de Resende
Reviews.Content: C a m e r a resistente a água, tamanho do led muito bom. boas funções e bom retorno e custo benefínio

Reviews.Title: great point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: adam
Reviews.Content: easy features to so that there is no muss or fuss and grab that picture quick. can't wait to put it threw its paces

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Damiano De Pinto
Reviews.Content: An Excellent camera at a very good price. love the military colors. a very good purcahse.I am very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING Camera!
Reviews.Author: Ciji Painter
Reviews.Content: This camera takes wonderful pictures! Lots of settings, low lag time, and SO portable, fits right in my pocket! I bought the Eye-Fi card with it, and my pictures are instantly loaded to my cell-phone so I can send these quality pictures right from my phone. I have not tested it underwater yet.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: gexuki
Reviews.Content: The pictures just look amazing even some weather conditions, i ride a motorcicle soo it sjust for me. I didnt use underwater (soo i dont know how it works) but at this moment its just amazing. I read some problems like fog but i didnt have it at this moment. I hope that the battery was high capacity (more mAn) and have different ways to charge it, not only whit its own charger.

Reviews.Title: very cool camera
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: really cool camera with lots of features built tough which is good for us because things get dropped and spilled on often

Reviews.Title: Good vacation camera
Reviews.Author: gamecock88
Reviews.Content: Purchased for trip to Jamaica.  Worked well in most light conditions and it's not all that expensive so you don't have to worry around the pool/beach.  Good camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great all purpose camera to replace all my other gadgets!
Reviews.Author: TD "wasabe"
Reviews.Content: The camera image quality, video quality, weather proofing, size, features and ease of use definitely makes it my favorite gear to replace all of my other gears.The few gripes I have are:1.  small buttons size2.  menu system could be more intuitive3.  need a water resistant strap

Reviews.Title: aw100
Reviews.Author: Federico Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: Grate camera! panoramic pics and underwater pics are awsome. I would buy the same one again If i had to.

Reviews.Title: Takes beautiful pictures
Reviews.Author: gamester
Reviews.Content: Both underwater pictures and skiing pictures have turned out great. Great little camera.Good purchase from Amazon. Love being a member of Amazon prime. If returns are needed, it is easy to do with no fuss.

Reviews.Title: This camera Rocks.
Reviews.Author: B. Bour "BJ"
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my active, skiing daughter.  She needed one to survive the cold and skiing.  It performs perfectly jsut like you would expect a Nikon to perform.  Good picks and good features too.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Gabriel
Reviews.Content: I've decide for Nikon for its quality and good history of products.I'm very satisfy with camera, the hardware is robust, and the sofware is brillant.In my case this poduct exceed my requirements.If you have teen agers, this camera is perfect, it resist any abandon or miss use.Recommended

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: alex
Reviews.Content: I'm satisfied with the purchase, everything is perfect, everything arrived at the expected time, recommend it, in a good product

Reviews.Title: excellent digi camera
Reviews.Author: Victor Hugo Zapata Andrade
Reviews.Content: i fell really happy on this purchase, this camera looks great for the outside and i cannnot wait to take the camera to a trip and take pictures..!! the price was fair enough and the shipping was fast A+++

Reviews.Title: love this camera
Reviews.Author: BUTTERFLY63
Reviews.Content: will never own another this is my camera in love with it ...super suprr camera the best highly recommend this

Reviews.Title: Highly Recommend...does everything I need...underwater pictures, gps, shock resistant, videos, panaramic pics
Reviews.Author: Aaron K. Hoffman
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my honeymoon in St Lucia. Works awesome underwater, used in snorkeling and the pictures turned out amazing. The GPS is useful,  It shows you exactly where you took the pictures when reviewing them. The panoramic feature is awesome too....great for the beaches and landscape on the island. Even dropped it a few times and no issues. The video and sound is clear and battery is sufficient. Great camera

Reviews.Title: excellent camera
Reviews.Author: SeaDips "SeaDips"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because my last nikon coolpix didnt survive a short fall..this one is much sturdier, takes great pics, is very easy to use - the battery life is great (and is a rechargeable battery..unlike the other coolpix).....tested it in water and it worked perfectly....finally think im going to hold on to a camera for a while!

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: BMCC004
Reviews.Content: Took this on a recent trip to Cayman. I was very worried about using this under water, as to how pics would turn out. However it worked GREAT. Took great pis and video under water. Just be careful to check lens is not smudged once you go from under water to above water pics. Also,  I followed drying, cleaning process from manual after having camera underwater and It worked very well.

Reviews.Title: Good underwater camera.
Reviews.Author: Kiril Deltchev Deltchev
Reviews.Content: Very good product for snorkeling. I made a lot of unforgettable pictures and videos with this little camera. The quality very good.

Reviews.Title: Amazing on every level
Reviews.Author: LK "LK73"
Reviews.Content: What a great product.  Purchased this for my son, and all of his friends were envious.  Comes in a very cool camo design and the pictures are of extremely high quality.  Easy to use, and a great price. I would highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Cool Camera
Reviews.Author: Paul W. Borden
Reviews.Content: I own a Nikonos camera but wanted something smaller and easier to use.  This fits the bill.  It is easy to use and has the Nikon quality as well.  I've tried it in a variety of environments without any issues.  The panorama feature is cool but it's tough to find a place to get 4" X 10" prints.  The underwater feature is a snap to use and it produces great pictures.  A must have for any serious photographer.

Reviews.Title: Great in Alaska
Reviews.Author: kellydeanledgerwood
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! I took this camera to Alaska to do a week of fishing and sight seeing and left my large bulky Nikon at home. I assumed I'd be sacrificing a lot in taking this little point and shoot over my D300S and I have to admit, I'm impressed. I've shot for years with large SLR's and have always turned my nose up at these small pocket cameras. I am a changed man! This camera does it all, I highly recommend it to anyone who needs to conserve on weight and bulk. Great shutter speed, easy to use and great, great color and image quality. Kelly Dean Ledgerwood

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: So far I am very pleased with this camera, took it to Cayo Costa and was very happy with the photos it captured. Also I find it easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for wet venues
Reviews.Author: TJbeads "TJB"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to carry with me when I am around the water - it works well under water - have had a lot of fun using it

Reviews.Title: Great tough little camera
Reviews.Author: jerry wexler
Reviews.Content: Great tough little camera. Thicker than most but durable. Good pics and video and sound. The only part I  don't enjoy is the long, long, long manual that goes on for days but to just point and shoot it is GREAT!

Reviews.Title: Limited Controls & Focus Issues, GPS slow
Reviews.Author: W. D. Garrett "TroutPoon™"
Reviews.Content: Very little manual control available, mostly options are set by choosing a scene. The lens focus had issues, and would reset itself, the GPS never synced during the 3 days I had it. I have high demands of my photo equipement. For a grab a go camera it might be ok for less picky

Reviews.Title: What is up with the lag time?
Reviews.Author: R. K. Tolentino
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased for my husband who is a wildland firefighter. We also purchased a Nikon S8200 at the same time for me. My husband used the AW100 while he was on fires this summer and really liked it. Since he returned home, we have been using his camera because mine is now reading "lens error" every time I try to turn it on. Anyway, back to the AW100... it takes great clear shots, but what is up with the lag time of taking pictures? I press the button, wait.....and then it takes the shot. Definitely not good when trying to capture a shot of our 3 year old or 1 year old! Also, some of the pictures we take are either washed out (mostly white) or really dark. It's set on the auto mode, so I don't know what's going on with it.  If it would just work right, it would be a great camera!

Reviews.Title: Good Rugged Camera for the Money
Reviews.Author: LA
Reviews.Content: I got this camera to replace a faulty Olympus Tough (re-manufactured). I needed a rugged camera to use outdoors.This camera really captures beautiful images. The battery lasts a long time before I have charge it. The software that came with it is quick and intuitive.It works somewhat differently than the Olympus Tough (which I've had two versions of). I'm having some issues with focus, but that might not be the camera's fault.The previous Olympus cameras seemed more sturdy since they were largely made of metal. I also wish it had a lens cover because it makes me nervous about scratching or damaging it.The camera does have video capability, but I haven't used it yet.I will continue to learn this camera and will update if necessary.

Reviews.Title: Nikon coolpix waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: chris-H
Reviews.Content: Great device. Works excellent Awesome pictures both above and underwater. Very happy to see it work as well as it did especially for the price

Reviews.Title: Freaking awesome
Reviews.Author: Spoon Tang
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take backpacking. I once got caught in the midst of a forest fire with nothing but a dead iPhone to record the event. Never again. The AW100 will be accompanying me on all my trips into the backcountry. It's compact enough that I slip it into my jacket pocket whenever I go out.The image and video quality is decent. I'm used to the adjustability of my DSLR, but the compactness and durability of the AW100 wins out for backcountry trips.

Reviews.Title: Neat' O Little Camera with a brain !
Reviews.Author: rudy parnell
Reviews.Content: Great camera.....does work as advertised. I would recommend this camera to newcomers or older photo buffs. I am not profic ient with all the applications and perhaps will never learn to operate the camera at it's highest levels of preformance but right out of the box even a novice can take great pictures and save them to their hard drive PC to distribute to friends and the internet. Great Fun....and very impressive.

Reviews.Title: Some initial issues, but takes great underwater pictures
Reviews.Author: jph
Reviews.Content: First use was a bit ominous because, after being rolled over in a wave, the camera wouldn't restart. Back in my room I opened the battery door (which was shut as tightly as I could close it) and found sand in the seal to the compartment (no water as I recall). I blew that away, took out the battery, recharged it, and the camera came back to life once the battery was fully charged and re-inserted. From then on I was very careful about making sure the door was closed properly, and had no further issues.The camera worked fine for about 6 more snorkel trips (~10hours in the water, with frequent dives to about 6ft down) and a snuba trip that included dives to about 25ft.I had a Panasonic Lumix DMC-TS2 for the trip 2yrs ago and loved it too, but the pictures with this AW100 were significantly better quality (at least to my untrained eye). Only other issue was that the lens fogged up on the inside on the last trip out (after a snorkel of about 1.5 hrs), but I found I could control that by keeping the lens pointed at the sun when not using the camera (I had seen the exact same thing with the TS2, which is why I bought a new camera). Have not noticed the fogging after the trip.BTW, the GPS option is very useful for determining where the pictured were taken, so that is a great feature, but turn it off if you are going underwater to save battery life.So some issues, but it takes great pictures, so overall very happy with the camera and would/have recommend it.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: wven villa
Reviews.Content: takes great pictures under water and out of it, brings several features, meets all my expectations. I totally recommend it for a great holiday.

Reviews.Title: It's great
Reviews.Author: Susanne
Reviews.Content: I bought this (in blue) and my spouse was using it all the time.I finally bought him his own - this one. We both love that he has his own. Easy to use, rugged, and fun. We had a bit of a problem figuring out which setting for distant night shots would work best when we first started out, but worked on it and now all is ok.

Reviews.Title: I love it but..
Reviews.Author: Claudia Rodriguez Pagoaga "Claudia Rodriguez"
Reviews.Content: this camera has exceeded all my expectations, I was a full SONY CYBERSHOT user, but since I bougth this camera, I would never change NIKON!!I only have 2 unresolved issues with it, one othem is the GPS.. I live in Honduras and I just can't make it work, maybe when I travel to usa or some other country it works. and the other one is the shaking feature, it works when I don't want it to work and it doesn't when I need it to work. i've read the manual and im not that fan of shaking..but in general, all the features, video, settings, OMG its just great!

Reviews.Title: LOVED CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Camera  was a Christmas gift for son goiing to Caribbean and beware the floating strap broke and his camera sank like a rock to be lost forever...

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Chip
Reviews.Content: super pictures and zoom in a compact traveling camera that is build for vacations at the waters edge and in the mountain snow

Reviews.Title: Device failed
Reviews.Author: Johnny Tech
Reviews.Content: The shutter / known issue happened with this within first 50 pictures while on vacation.  Item was returned, and I'll have to find another device. GPS/ World map, panoramic and the pictures that i did take underwater came out nicely.

Reviews.Title: Not waterproof
Reviews.Author: Wren
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera if used in mild climates. It can take beautiful pictures away from water.Unfortunately when used near water and in intense sun the inside of the lens and screen will fog. I submerged the camera no more that 6 inches for 5 seconds, and as soon as the sun hit the lens and screen they began to fog. Ruining pictures of the beautiful fish we caught. The underwater pictures I took did not turn out although I didn't experiment with this too much. The GPS was accurate within 30 miles, again I didn't experiment with this.

Reviews.Title: i gave it a good try, but returned it ...
Reviews.Author: P. Shepard
Reviews.Content: maybe I'm ruined w/ so many years of dSLR use... but wanted to try, carry a smaller camera-- especially one to stand up to the wild, rugged use I wouldn't subject the dSLRs to.  I was especially attracted to the waterproof, underwater possibilities of this camera after having lost a previous "point & shoot" model to water damage. As I read the manual, it became clear that using this in a water environment required special care I wouldn't be able to provide (e.g. ...allow camera to sit in clear water within 1/2 hour of water submersion...).  also, not particularly impressed w/ the functioning, results of product. like i said, maybe many years use of dSLRs doesn't make me best judge for this camera.

Reviews.Title: Not Up to Snuff ...
Reviews.Author: Timothy S. Shropshire "'rangsmith"
Reviews.Content: Nicely functioning camera with a lot of nifty functions, BUT the image quality is Not up to Nikon's reputation at all. Very Soft edges extend way into the frame. Can not recommend this one.

Reviews.Title: GPS is not cool
Reviews.Author: Suren Ter Saakov
Reviews.Content: The camera is as expected. No miracles & no disappointing. GPS generally works. But it's so not sensitive and slow. I'm most cases you can pull the camera out and take a shot before the GPS catch the location. If you are in a city, in a car etc - say goodbuy to GPS tags. Overall just 50%-70% of pictures get GPS tags.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: CD
Reviews.Content: Happy with this camera.  Great price and the videos have been decent.  Would recommend to someone looking for low-cost video/camera.

Reviews.Title: Nikon
Reviews.Author: M
Reviews.Content: The camera takes good pictures and is perfect for days out on the river. I am satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Cool Camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Cindy Levenburg
Reviews.Content: I brought this camera to use mainly under water, which I will be going on a cruise coming up in January. I am impressed already how the photo's turn out.  My only wish was that the buttons were more identifiable where they are, as everything is so close together.I also own a Nikon Digital S.L. D-300.

Reviews.Title: TOP 10 of my choice AAA+ camera
Reviews.Author: Doug
